name: Smashy Car Race 3D: Pixel Cop Chase
name_original: Smashy Car Race 3D: Pixel Cop Chase
description:
Drive fast to escape from the police being a wanted criminal! It’s high time to dominate the road! Race through the city traffic trying to escape the cop chase, but try to avoid crossy pedestrians! Cops are in pursuit, so try not to be busted!

Live the life of a wanted bandit and race down the road to survive! Are you going to be imprisoned? Drive around the city, avoid cop cars that are chasing you and survive as long as possible playing Smashy Car Race 3D: Pixel Cop Chase!

Escape from the police being WANTED! Explore city roads racing your pixel car as a real criminal! Collect coins to buy new vehicles or upgrade pixel car you have! Drive jeeps, trucks or even tanks and choose your favorite one! Prove your worth as a criminal driver and try not to be busted! Police cars are everywhere looking for the most wanted bandit – YOU! Race city roads and find your ways trough the traffic, but try not to hit crossy pedestrians, it will lose you points! Drive fast or be busted playing Smashy Car Race 3D: Pixel Cop Chase!

Smash your way past the cops with this ultimate racing game in 3D - a cross between extreme racing simulator and a cop chase game. Take part in extreme police chase driving different pixel vehicles – cars, trucks, jeeps and tanks. Upgrade its speed and maneuverability or even buy new ones collecting coins. Take your driving skills to new level with Smashy Car Race 3D: Pixel Cop Chase! Join the traffic race, avoid obstacles on the highway like trucks, buses and other cars! Smashing your car will fell your right in the cop’s hands! Speed up your pixel car and don’t forget that you are WANTED!

Smashy Car Race 3D: Pixel Cop Chase features:

- Race fast as a wanted criminal, escape from a cop chase
- Collect coins driving down the road and upgrade the pixel car your have! Up level car’s speed or maneuverability or buy new vehicle to drive – jeeps, trucks and even pixel tanks are available
- Huge pixel city made of cubes and blocks to explore
- Ultimate 3D graphics

Explore pixel city trying to shake off pursuit, race fast and never let the police catch you! Test your driving skills being a bandit and try not to be busted! Cops are everywhere, so be accurate! If you love car games and driving simulator you will love Smashy Car Race 3D: Pixel Cop Chase! Survive on the city streets maneuvering through heavy traffic!

It’s high time to smash the road!
